DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_TOP3_EXECUTIVOS_REVENDA
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT TOP 5 ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.TOTAL DESC) AS POSICAO, A.NOME, B.TOTAL,
 CASE
 WHEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.TOTAL DESC) = 1 THEN '#FFD700'
 WHEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.TOTAL DESC) = 2 THEN '#C0C0C0'
 WHEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.TOTAL DESC) = 3 THEN '#bf8970'
 WHEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.TOTAL DESC) > 3 THEN '#89c4f4'
 END COR
FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS A
JOIN (
 SELECT BB.RESPONSAVEL,SUM(BB.VALORTOTAL) TOTAL
 FROM K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES BB
 WHERE 1=1
 AND YEAR(DATAFECHAMENTO) = YEAR(GETDATE())
 AND STATUS = 10
 AND BB.FILIAL <> 1
 GROUP BY RESPONSAVEL) B ON B.RESPONSAVEL = A.HANDLE
WHERE K_EXECUTIVOCONTAS = 'S'
ORDER BY TOTAL DESC
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="POSICAO" From="A" Path="POSICAO" /> <Field Alias="NOME" From="A" Path="NOME" /> <DecimalField Alias="TOTAL" From="A" Path="TOTAL" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> <Field Alias="COR" From="A" Path="COR" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
